tierOneHarmfulStatusEffects.summary: [DISADVANTAGE] on any [SPELL TEST] or [MARTIAL TEST] against the source of fear and can't move closer to it.
tierOneHarmfulStatusEffects.description: You are shaken by am event or creature and have [DISADVANTAGE] on any [SPELL TEST] or [MARTIAL TEST] and can't move closer to the source of your fear.

tierOneHarmfulStatusEffects.summary: Recieves 1d6 fire damage at the start of the turn, can douse the flames to stop the burning
tierOneHarmfulStatusEffects.description:
A burning creature recieves 1d6 fire damage at the start of the creatures turn.
The burning creature or a creature within melee can end this effect early by using 2 [AP] and making a [DT] 10 [AGI] [ATTRIBUTE TEST] to douse the flames. On a success the effect ends.

tierTwoHarmfulStatusEffects.summary: [DISADVANTAGE] on any [D20 TEST], can't move closer to source of fear.
tierTwoHarmfulStatusEffects.description: You are frigthened by an event or creature and have [DISADVANTAGE] on any [D20 TEST] as long as you are within 18m of the source of your fear and can see or hear them. Additionally you can't move closer to the source of your fear.

tierTwoHarmfulStatusEffects.summary: Recieves 4d6 fire damage at the start of the turn, can douse the flames to stop the burning
tierTwoHarmfulStatusEffects.description:
A burning creature recieves 4d6 fire damage at the start of the creatures turn.
The burning creature or a creature within melee can end this effect early by using 2 [AP] and making a [DT] 15 [AGI] [ATTRIBUTE TEST] to douse the flames. On a success the effect ends.

tierThreeHarmfulStatusEffects.summary: Deeply terrified, has to spend all [AP] and [MP] to fell from source of fear.
tierThreeHarmfulStatusEffects.description: You are terrified by an event or creature and have to spend all [MP] to move away from the source of fear and all their [AP] to further flee until the source of fear is no longer within line of sight and at least 18m away from them.

tierThreeHarmfulStatusEffects.summary: Recieves 10d6 fire damage at the start of the turn, can douse the flames to stop the burning
tierThreeHarmfulStatusEffects.description:
A burning creature recieves 10d6 fire damage at the start of the creatures turn.
The burning creature or a creature within melee can end this effect early by using 2 [AP] and making a [DT] 20 [AGI] [ATTRIBUTE TEST] to douse the flames. On a success the effect ends.
